## CharityORG.activatePiece() method

Activates a stored piece

**Signature:**

```typescript
activatePiece(name): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | (not declared) | The name of the banner piece to activate |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the piece was activated, False if not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 8 GB

Activates the stored banner piece. Must have at least 1 spot open.
